rules_text:
Menace, deathtouch
[i]General of the Dead[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, mill four cards, then you return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
[i]Sökkvabekkr – [/i]{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Lif, General of the Dead gets +1/+1 for each creature card in all graveyards.
